note.p: Career: Became a cornet in the 8th Dragoons (1788); sold out (1794); took up oriental and especially Persian studies, in Leyden; gazetted Major in Lord Ayr's regiment of dragoons, Carlisle (left 1796); accompanied Sir Gore Ouseley as his private secretary, on a mission to Persia (1810-1813)
Notes: Note on election certificate: Withdrawn
